line_1: But to none but myself will that image retrace,
line_2: As the mirror that, just to each blemish or grace,

line_1: My tortur'd mem'ry cannot it retrace;
line_2: But horrors, which e'en madness can't efface.

line_1: " While warmly I romantic dreams re-trace;
line_2: "With equal awe she view'd the solemn place,

line_1: How leaps my conscious heart, whilst I retrace
line_2: The dear idea of that strict embrace?

line_1: Alas! the solemn slaughter I retrace,
line_2: Bath'd in moist sorrow, many a beauteous face,

line_1: Each fading stroke they now retrace,
